name: Space Elite Force
description: Space Elite Force is a frenetic side-scrolling, full of explosions and epic battles against bosses. With its large amount of upgrades and its high level of difficulty, Space Elite Force is the ideal game for anyone who wants frenzied action, quick plays and a few hours of fun. Embark on this battle and help defeat the awful Klyvu race!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.6 Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 3.0 Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
